front.title: Basic Requirements for IPv6 Customer Edge Routers

abstract.t: This document specifies requirements for an IPv6 Customer Edge (CE) router. Specifically, the current version of this document focuses on the basic provisioning of an IPv6 CE router and the provisioning of IPv6 hosts attached to it. The document also covers IP transition technologies. Two transition technologies in RFC 5969's 6rd and RFC 6333's DS-Lite. are covered in the document. The document obsoletes RFC 6204, if approved.
